title: Capstone Project
content:
Who are some of the good faculty under CSE department to work under? 
And is CGPA diversity really important?

comments.body:
As already discussed on this sub, you need to mention your research interests before someone can recommend profs since you cannot approach any random prof to be your guide. 

And no, CGPA diversity isn't a strict requirement usually. They usually waive it.

ML is broad. What kind of ML research do you want to pursue? Foundational ML or applied ML? Do you want to work in computer vision, NLP or reinforcement learning? Which field do you want to apply these techniques in? Etc. You will need to first have a solid research goal before you can approach a prof since they are specialised in different fields.
